attributes.action: Provide FULL access to the Brexit Legal Advice as received by Government
attributes.additional_details: What is one of the largest UK political decisions being made since the Second World War it is paramount that we have transparency and access to the legal advice as provided to the UK Government in relation to the deal they have arrived at when negotiating the UK's exit from the EU. This is a matter of public interest and would serve greater clarity on an issue effecting UK politics, the UK economy, society and our democracy.
attributes.background: For reasons of public interest and UK democracy it is required that the UK public, and specifically the House of Commons, get full and unrestricted access to the Legal advice as provided to the UK Government in relation to Brexit.
